shows.desc:
Yours Truly is a mesmerising one-man show, written and directed by Murray Watts (Riding Lights, The Miracle Maker) and brilliantly performed by actor Andrew Harrison. Drawn from a new collection of modern parables and stories, this stage show is funny, moving and inspirational.

Murray Watts has written numerous plays and screenplays, including the award-winning film ‘The Miracle Maker’.
